title: Personal Selling - Meaning - Features - Needs - Explainer Video
description:
Khonjel Infotainment
93 subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
Personal-selling or salesmanship are synonymous terms; with the only difference that the former term is of recent origin, while the latter term has been traditionally in usage, in the commercial world.

Since a salesman, in persuading a prospect to buy a certain product, follows a personal approach; salesmanship, in the present-day-times in often popularly called as personal selling.

Personal selling (or salesmanship) is the most traditional method, devised by manufactures, for promotion of the sales of their products. Prior to the development of the advertising technique, personal selling used to be the only method used by manufacturers for promotion of sales. It is, in fact, the forerunner of advertising and other sales promotion devices.
SHOW LESS

Personal selling occurs when a sales representative meets with a potential client for the purpose of transacting a sale. Many sales representatives rely on a sequential sales process that typically includes seven steps.

Here are the seven(7) basic steps of Personal Selling

title: 7 Steps to Selling Physical Products Online in 2021
description:
Selz
SUBSCRIBE
Adding something new to your product line can be a great way to bring in new customers and encourage repeat business. 

You can sell physical products online like clothing, jewelry, and tech, there’s just the added layer of inventory management and fulfillment to keep in mind.

The internet is huge, and selling online means that your competition can be global in scope. One of the key ways to build a solid ecommerce strategy is finding a niche where you are competing with relatively few businesses. At the heart, it’s about finding what makes your business unique and using that to your advantage. Want more tips?

This video covers everything you need to know to start selling physical products online.

Ready to take your business to the next level? Sign up for a free 14-day trial and sell physical products online with Selz.

title: Sell On Amazon - Getting Started - How to Start Selling on Amazon
description:
Amazon Seller University
83.1K subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
This Seller University video will give you a step-by-step overview of how to sell on Amazon. Selling on Amazon can be broken down into 4 main steps:

1) Creating an Amazon Seller Central account 
2) Listing products for sale on Amazon
3) Fulfilling customer orders using different options such as Amazon FBA
4) Receiving payments from your product sales on Amazon and maintaining your account health

When you start to sell on Amazon, you become part of a retail destination that’s home to sellers of all kinds, from Fortune 500 organizations to artisan vendors who make handcrafted and customized goods. They all sell here for a reason: to reach the hundreds of millions of customers who visit Amazon to shop.

Register to Sell on Amazon:  https://sell.amazon.com/

title: 8 Undeniable Tips To Keep Customers For Life | Brian Tracy
description:
Brian Tracy
1.27M subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
A direct sale to a customer today can cost more than $400 in terms of time, travel, advertising, lead generation, and other expenses. Acquiring a customer at this cost can put a company out of business unless that customer buys again and again. http://bit.ly/2UV1mgP

Customer loyalty is KEY. Here are some tips to help you keep customers for life, since repeat customers are the most valuable of all.

To help you keep customers for life, I've included a FREE sales presentation template. Click the link above to download!
